Name: Tiramisu Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: Chef meets bartender in the rich dessert cocktail.
History: Created by Adam Ennis in 2001 at Isola bar in London, England.
